CustomField.description: If TRUE, then workflow will auto populate Budgeted Cost and Actual Cost of task based on Planned and Actual Effort using User/Contact billable rate.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If TRUE, then workflow will auto populate Budgeted Cost and Actual Cost of task based on Planned and Actual Effort using User/Contact billable rate.
CustomField.label: Use Effort to Calculate Cost
